# Third-Party Components

This directory contains third-party code adapted for use in FastGen.

| Component | Description | README |
|-----------|-------------|--------|
| [Depth Anything V2](annotators/depth_anything_v2/) | Depth estimation for VACE WAN | [README](annotators/depth_anything_v2/README.md) |
| [WAN Prompt Expand](wan_prompt_expand/) | Prompt expansion for WAN 2.1 | [README](wan_prompt_expand/README.md) |
